second.title: Add your documents
second.content: Securely save and store digital versions of your documents

third.title: Authenticate with Wallet
third.content: Use this app to present your documents and access online services

pin.title: Create an unlock code
pin.subTitle: This is the 6-digit code to access and authorize certain operations in the app.

policy.title: How to choose the code?
policy.description: The unlock code is made up of 6 digits and will be used to access and authorize certain operations in the app.

bulletList.title: Choose a code that is hard to guess and does not contain:
bulletList.secondItem: a sequence of ordered numbers (e.g. 123456 or 654321).

invalid.title: Too easy!
invalid.description: Choose a code that is hard to guess, which does not contain a single repeated number (e.g. 000000) or a sequence of ordered numbers (e.g. 123456 or 654321).

match.title: The code you enter is different than the first one

notEnrolled.description:
You can use your face or fingerprint instead of the unlock code. This will allow you to access the app and authorize operations more quickly and securely. 
 
 To do this, you first need to configure it in your device's system settings.

thirdItem.label: Step 3
thirdItem.value: Enable it in Wallet under Profile > Security

noLockScreen.title: Protect your device
noLockScreen.subtitle: Wallet sends you communications that concern you personally. Make sure that only you can access the application by setting a code or pattern to unlock the device.

secondItem.label: Step 2
secondItem.value: Set a code or sign to unlock the device

available.title: Enable biometric recognition
available.settings: You can always change your choice in Profile > Security
available.body: You can use your face or fingerprint instead of the unlock code. This will allow you to access the app and authorize operations more quickly and securely.
